opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Barnes, in Her Official Capacity as Member of the Board of Police Commissioners of Kansas City, Missouri v. Gorman

opinion:
535 U.S. 968

BARNES, IN HER OFFICIAL CAPACITY AS MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF POLICE COMMISSIONERS OF KANSAS CITY, MISSOURI, ET AL.
v.
GORMAN.

No. 01-682.

Supreme Court of the United States.

April 1, 2002.

1

C. A. 8th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 534 U. S. 1103.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
